701964f-a.title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Park ( - Saxon Avenue
701964f-a.text:
VVan Cortlandt Park South, at the S.E. corner of Saxon Ave., ahowing the technical and test building (structure with flags) of the Radio Corporation of America occupying that site. The view is southwestward from Mosholt Parkway South (foreground).
May 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701964f-a.folder: Van Cortlandt Park ( & Saxon Avenue, Bronx, NY
